strings.evolution:
So this is an awakening...
I feel a wave of new ideas
coming to me.
strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.description: A salve-maker who wanders the world freely. Ilias has devoted himself to creating medicinal remedies that everyone can have easy access to without having to rely on magical recovery methods. The root for his motivation lies in the stories he heard as a child, where the salve-maker Mel sacrificed her own body to further research the effects of her concoctions. Like Mel, Ilias has come to show a sense of self-sacrifice himself as he follows in her footsteps.
strings.fusion: I'll do my best to make some new medicine so that this improvement doesn't go to waste!
strings.summon:
I want to make everyone feel better.
If my medicine can be of use to you,
please use it as you will.

strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.description: A salve-maker who wanders the world treating people's illnesses. Although many prefer to use more contemporary methods such as magic to treat the ill and the wounded, Ilias has always turned to nature in order to make organic concoctions to the same end. He may not serve for brute force in battle, but his resilient attitude and wide knowledge of various types of medicine have seen him through his journey.
strings.fusion:
Huh, this is for me!?
I'd better get on to my next line of research!
strings.summon:
I am a doctor.
I wonder if I could be of some help?

strings.evolution:
With this power I feel I can
make even better potions.
Thank you so much!
strings.affinity:
Thank you so much for trusting in me so.
I hope this is of use to you in the future.
strings.description: A salve-maker who travels the world in search of ingredients to create new concoctions that can help people of all kinds. Prince Shera invited Ilias to join his own personal forces, a squadron operating in secrecy within the Zoldaad Empire, to put his strong motivation and talents to good use. There he gained powerful companions with whom he accomplished a number of rigorous missions by playing the crucial role of their logistical support during battle.
strings.fusion:
Thank you for the enhancement.
The more knowledge I have,
the more people I'll be able to save.
strings.summon:
Please use my medicine in your travels.
That will take care of the first step
in me accomplishing my dreams.
